WorkItem.Description: Just started using Wsus Package Publisher and when trying to install the latest Adobe Flash I get this error in Wsus Package Publisher -2147023293 and error 0x80070643 in Windows update.

Comments.Message:
Please, 
- Stop the "Windows update" service on the client computer.
- Delete the "C:\Windows\WindowsUpdate.log" file.
- Start the "Windows update" service on the client computer.
- Launch a detection/installation
- When installation failed, send me the "C:\Windows\WindowsUpdate.log" file. at package.publisher@free.fr
